footer.description: Take control of your finances with our powerful and intuitive finance tracker.
footer.copyright: Â© 2024 Finance Tracker. All rights reserved.

landing.heroSubtitle: Track income, manage expenses, and achieve your financial goals with our powerful finance tracker.
landing.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need to manage your finances effectively
landing.feature1Desc: Easily record and categorize all your income and expenses.
landing.feature2Desc: Set budgets for categories and track your spending progress.
landing.feature3Desc: Get a clear view of your financial health with detailed analytics.
landing.feature4Desc: Support for multiple currencies and languages.
landing.feature1Detail1: Track all your income and expenses in one place
landing.feature1Detail3: View detailed financial reports and analytics
landing.feature1Detail4: Export data in multiple formats (CSV, PDF, Excel)
landing.feature2Detail1: Set monthly and yearly budgets by category
landing.feature2Detail2: Get real-time alerts when approaching limits
landing.feature2Detail3: Track budget progress with visual indicators
landing.pricingSubtitle: Start free and upgrade as you grow
landing.videoSubtitle: Watch how easy it is to manage your finances with our powerful tracker

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. Learn how we protect your data.
privacy.highlight1Desc: Your data is encrypted and secure
privacy.highlight2Desc: We never share your personal information
privacy.highlight3Desc: You control your data at all times
privacy.footerNote: Your privacy matters. We are committed to protecting your personal information.
privacy.section1Content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including your name, email address, and financial data when you use our services. All data is stored locally on your device using secure browser storage.
privacy.section2Content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services. Your financial data is processed locally and never transmitted to external servers without your explicit consent.
privacy.section3Content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information. All data is encrypted and stored securely on your device. We do not have access to your financial data.
privacy.section4Content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time through your account settings. You can also export your data or reset your account completely.
privacy.section5Content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our contact page.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our service
terms.footerNote: By using our service, you agree to these terms and conditions.
terms.section1Content: By accessing and using our finance tracker, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
terms.section2Content: Permission is granted to temporarily use our service for personal, non-commercial use. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not modify or copy the materials.
terms.section3Content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.
terms.section4Content: Our service is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We shall not be liable for any damages arising from the use or inability to use our service.
terms.section5Content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Your continued use of the service after any changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Empowering individuals to take control of their financial future
about.missionContent: We believe that everyone deserves access to powerful financial tools that help them understand, manage, and improve their financial health. Our mission is to make personal finance management simple, accessible, and effective for everyone.
about.value1Desc: We believe in complete transparency. Your data stays on your device, and you have full control over your financial information.
about.value2Desc: Your privacy and security are our top priorities. We use industry-standard encryption and security practices to protect your data.
about.value3Desc: We're committed to providing excellent customer support and continuously improving our platform based on user feedback.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it - hear from our satisfied users
testimonials.testimonial1Content: This finance tracker has completely transformed how I manage my money. The budgeting features are intuitive and the insights are incredibly helpful.
testimonials.testimonial2Content: As a business owner, keeping track of expenses was always a challenge. This app makes it so easy to categorize and monitor everything.
testimonials.testimonial3Content: Starting my financial journey was overwhelming, but this tracker helped me understand my spending habits and set realistic goals. Highly recommend!

blog.title: Finance Blog
blog.subtitle: Expert tips and insights to help you manage your finances better
blog.upgradeMessage: Full access to our blog articles is available with Standard or Premium plans. Upgrade now to read complete articles and access exclusive content!
blog.articleNotFoundMessage: The article you are looking for does not exist.
blog.basicPlanRestriction: This article is available for Standard and Premium plans only

reports.title: Reports & Analytics
reports.trendsDescription: Analyze your spending patterns over time to identify trends and opportunities for savings.
reports.insightsDescription: Deep dive into category spending with detailed breakdowns and recommendations.
reports.healthDescription: Get a comprehensive score of your financial health based on multiple factors.
reports.predictiveDescription: AI-powered predictions for future spending and income patterns.

tutorial.welcomeDescription: Get started with our interactive tutorial or explore the app with demo data.
tutorial.tourDescription: Take a guided tour through the main features of the app. Learn how to use each section step by step.
tutorial.demoDescription: Explore the app with sample data. See how everything works without affecting your real data.
tutorial.demoModeDescription: You are viewing the app with sample data. Your real data is safe.

welcome.title: Welcome! ðŸ‘‹
welcome.content: Welcome to Finance Tracker! This interactive tour will help you get started. Let's explore the main features together.

navigation.title: Navigation Sidebar
navigation.content: Use the sidebar to navigate between different sections: Dashboard, Transactions, Budgets, and more. Click on any item to go to that page.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.content: The Dashboard gives you a quick overview of your financial health. You'll see your balance, income, expenses, and recent transactions here.

features.title: Ready to Start!
features.content: You're all set! Start by adding your first transaction or creating a budget. Need help? Click the help icon anytime.

welcome.title: Dashboard Overview ðŸ“Š
welcome.content: This is your financial dashboard. Here you can see all your key financial metrics at a glance.

balance.title: Your Balance
balance.content: This card shows your current balance - the difference between your total income and expenses.

charts.title: Visual Analytics
charts.content: These charts help you visualize your spending patterns, income trends, and category breakdowns.

transactions.title: Recent Transactions
transactions.content: Here you can see your most recent transactions. Click on 'Transactions' in the sidebar to manage all your transactions.

welcome.title: Transaction Management ðŸ’°
welcome.content: This is where you manage all your income and expense transactions. Let's learn how to use it.

add.title: Add Transaction
add.content: Click this button to add a new transaction. You can record income or expenses with details like amount, category, date, and description.

filters.title: Filter & Search
filters.content: Use filters to find specific transactions. You can filter by type, category, date range, and search by description.

views.title: View Modes
views.content: Switch between different view modes: Cards, Table, Calendar, or Compact view to see your transactions in the way that works best for you.

welcome.title: Budget Management ðŸ“‹
welcome.content: Budgets help you control your spending. Set limits for different categories and track your progress.

add.title: Create Budget
add.content: Click here to create a new budget. Set a spending limit for any category and choose if it's monthly or yearly.

progress.title: Budget Progress
progress.content: Each budget card shows your progress with a visual indicator. Green means you're on track, red means you've exceeded the limit.

search.shortcuts: Press Enter to select, Esc to close

shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
shortcuts.subtitle: Speed up your workflow with these shortcuts
